originalTitle: 'Blood was all over' - victim of Nigeria church abduction describes escape
title: 'Blood was all over' - victim of Nigeria church abduction describes escape
content: Some 160 people are believed to be missing after attackers raided three churches in a Nigerian village on Sunday.

originalTitle: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
title: Ugandan MP and Bobi Wine ally arrested over election violence
content: The opposition politician is accused of election violence in which at least seven people were killed.

originalTitle: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
title: Slashed incomes and gamers go cold turkey: the fallout from Uganda's internet shutdown
content: The internet was shut during the general election, leaving many people without any income - or entertainment.

originalTitle: Six key takeaways from Jack Smith’s testimony on his case against Trump
title: Six key takeaways from Jack Smith’s testimony on his case against Trump
content: Testifying at a House hearing, Jack Smith said the two federal cases were based on evidence, not politics.

originalTitle: Vietnam’s To Lam wins second term, extends top position for 5 more years
title: Vietnam’s To Lam wins second term, extends top position for 5 more years
content: To Lam will continue to lead Vietnam's Communist Party amid pledges to continue rapid reform of country's economy.

originalTitle: ‘Psychological war on society’: Russia plunges Ukraine into darkness
title: ‘Psychological war on society’: Russia plunges Ukraine into darkness
content: As key buildings, including the Parliament, suffer from blackouts, finding light is ever challenging across Ukraine.

originalTitle: Could Trump's new Board of Peace sideline the struggling UN?
title: Could Trump's new Board of Peace sideline the struggling UN?
content: The US president has promised to "end decades of suffering" but critics dismiss his Board of Peace as a vainglorious project.

originalTitle: Eight surprise takeaways from the Oscar nominations
title: Eight surprise takeaways from the Oscar nominations
content: Paul Mescal and Chase Infiniti missed out, while other actors carried their films to a nomination.

originalTitle: ICE detains five-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
title: ICE detains five-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
content: The boy was taken along with his father, the lawyer and school officials say. ICE says it kept the boy safe as his father ran.

originalTitle: How 55 seconds left Forest's Europa League hopes in balance
title: How 55 seconds left Forest's Europa League hopes in balance
content: Nottingham Forest's hopes of a top-eight finish in the Europa League - and a straight route to the last 16 - are hanging by a thread.

originalTitle: 'He's my son' - Emery on pushing Tielemans
title: 'He's my son' - Emery on pushing Tielemans
content: Aston Villa manager Unai Emery plays down a heated touchline incident with midfielder Youri Tielemans after substituting him against Fenerbahce.

title: Rodman 'becomes highest-paid women's footballer'
content: Trinity Rodman signs a new three-year deal with Washington Spirit that will reportedly make her the world's highest-paid female footballer.
